name: Sturdy Exchange
intro: Collect, trade, and sell digital art
introduce: Sturdy Exchange is a platform for musicians, brands, and entertainers to reach the masses with a new form of ownership & utility, by leveraging Non Fungible Tokens (NFTs). It provide the ultimate fan experience by democratizing access to NFTs at multiple price entry points. Users can support their favorite artists, show off their collection, and unlock real world utility.
